programme.title: Ô la belle vie
programme.desc: Meyrueis, a visionary village In the Jonte Gorges and at the foot of Mont Aigoual, Meyrueis is where the Causses meet the Cévennes. A wild unspoilt valley where villages are rare. Meyrueis itself is home to only 800 inhabitants for a surface area equivalent to that of Paris. Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc:
Rue de la Santé
At the junction of the 13th and 14th arrondissements, the Rue de la Santé is associated with the best-known and last-remaining prison within the city of Paris, opened in 1867. It takes its name from the hospital founded by Anne of Austria, ancestor of the current Sainte-Anne Hospital.
Presented by: Yvan Hallouin.

programme.title: Ça va ma gueule ?
programme.desc:
This sixth Filme ton Quartier competition, supported by Clément Cotentin, offers reactions to the theme "Ça va ma gueule?". A look back at the selected documentaries and portraits of the winners. Local faces, stories of appearance and character, my face or yours, good-looking, disfigured, preparing to do battle... An anthology.

Directed by: Chloé Mahieu (France, 2022)

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Homemade corn tortillas
For an easy-to-prepare way to serve prawn tacos and a mango salsa, Ricardo cooks his own home-made corn tortillas for a flavour that's even more authentic.
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc:
Rue de la Santé
At the junction of the 13th and 14th arrondissements, the Rue de la Santé is associated with the best-known and last-remaining prison within the city of Paris, opened in 1867. It takes its name from the hospital founded by Anne of Austria, ancestor of the current Sainte-Anne Hospital.
Presented by: Yvan Hallouin.

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Dried flowers How to make an unusual herbarium?

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: La cheffe de la garde et les lutins taquins

programme.title: L'Afrik en conte
programme.desc: The gorilla and the man Once upon a time, a long long time ago, men and gorillas were inseparable cousins. But they grew apart, one living in the bush and the other in a village. And all because of the gorilla's pride and stupidity. Directed by: Franck Fokus (Côte d'Ivoire, 2022)

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Long live the family!
Today, Rocky and Lily are taking a look at families, or more specifically at family trees and genealogy.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Homemade corn tortillas
For an easy-to-prepare way to serve prawn tacos and a mango salsa, Ricardo cooks his own home-made corn tortillas for a flavour that's even more authentic.
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc:
Noah's Ark
Cécil Bazin, zoo director, is found dead in the cheetah enclosure. Despite the bite marks, it wasn't a cheetah that killed her. Had someone wanted to make it look like an accident by letting one of the big cats into the enclosure when it should have spent the night indoors?
Directed by: Jason Roffé (season 6, France, 2021) Screenplay: Manon Dillys Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Baya Rehaz (Inès Zaïdi), Tatiana Gousseff (Sabine Mauriac), Alban Casterman (Célestin Morel) Genre: detective

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc:
Blood brothers
Fishermen surprise Julien, Alice's boyfriend, cleaning-up a crime scene at the port. Everything points to him as the one who killed his friend Mickael. Léa tries desperately to get Julien to explain, but he refuses to say anything. Why would he have attacked someone he considered as a brother?
Directed by: Jason Roffé (season 6, France, 2021) Screenplay: Denis Alamercery Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Baya Rehaz (Inès Zaïdi), Tatiana Gousseff (Sabine Mauriac), Alban Casterman (Célestin Morel) Genre: detective

programme.title: L'énarque est un humain (presque) comme les autres
programme.desc:
From January 2019 to October 2020, Virginie Linhart followed a class at the l'École Nationale d'Administration in Strasbourg, not knowing it would be one of the last. Over time, the prestigious school became a lightning rod for hostility against the "ruling class". A documentary report.
Directed by: Virginie Linhart (France, 2021)

programme.title: Embarquement
programme.desc: The province of Anhui (China) For those seeking to discover a China where modernity and age-old traditions continue to coexist, the province of Anhui awaits you! Directed by: Antonio Buscardini (Belgium, 2019)

programme.title: Au bout de l'enquête, la fin du crime parfait ?
Au bout de l'enquête, la fin du crime parfait ?
Curieuse de nature dans les îles
programme.desc: Le cobra au Sahara (Maroc) Aussi discret que méconnu, le cobra est la star malheureuse de la place Jemaa el-Fnaa à Marrakech. Sans ses glandes à venins et ses crochets, il ne survit jamais à son exposition au public. Avec Abdellah Bouazza, nous cherchons ce bel animal sous les pierres chauffées à blanc du désert. Présentation : Myriam Baran. Réalisation : Nicolas Brikké (Saison 4, France, 2019)

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Uber Eats
programme.desc: French football championship. Day 29. Marseille/Montpellier. At Orange Vélodrome (Marseille). 1st half-time. Commentaries: Rémy Tissier, Stéphane Pauwels.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Uber Eats
programme.desc: French football championship. Day 29. Marseille/Montpellier. At Orange Vélodrome (Marseille). 2nd half-time. Commentaries: Rémy Tissier, Stéphane Pauwels.

programme.title: Je slame, tu slames
programme.desc:
An art at the crossroads: slam poetry. Throughout Quebec, more and more people, both professionals and amateurs, are taking part in poetry slams. Who are they? What drives them to get up on stage, to win over our ears and hearts?

Directed by: Jean Fugazza (Canada, 2021)
